proyectounoinfo: First version of my personal Portfolio.
proyectodosinfo: Website for artists; in this case, I took elements from the official website of the artist to redesign it from scratch, adding new styles.
proyectotresinfo: Personal project for the reading of poems, which are obtained by consuming an API using axios.
proyectocuatroinfo: Dedicated to managing the 'ALAN Poetry' project database; without any elaborated styles.
